workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.3262242027830091 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.1282765705789886 --weight-decay 0.00059539825791919 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0009428799234197225 --lr-period-updates 31380.240668080718 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.08906162732400634 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
